website_summaries.verdict: Relatively affordable, easy to operate, and quick to build up to your preferred temperature, this quality infrared sauna makes is easy for 2 people to unwind at once.
pros: Fits up to 2 people at once
Thick panels made from Canadian hemlock wood
Simply plug into a 15 A, 110 V outlet
cons: Its integrated speakers are good, but they could be better

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, poor EMF output
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as having low EMF in the max range of 10mGauss, however I used a Triifield meter to measure the EMF output and made sure to test both on and off to see the difference. I was shocked to see that EMF output is actually around 50-60mGauss while seated at the bench inside the unit. I understand that negative health risks may be associated with anything higher than 10mGauss. 40-50mGauss is pushing it. Altogether, I would say this is a nice sauna, easy to assemble, and definitely heats up and retains the heat, but am a little nervous about the possibile health complications from the actual EMF output measured on my Trifield meter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They recommend that you put a towel over your legs
customer_reviews.text: The bottom heaters (bench and floor) produce no heat. This is known by the manufacturer. They recommend that you put a towel over your legs. :| I've had 3 saunas prior to this one. They all had adequate heating near the bottom (bench or otherwise). Not sure why this design was chosen, but I'm not a fan of it. Other than that, the construction is solid, the sauna looks nice, and the other heaters work great.
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: Allow Plenty of Time For Installation
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was scheduled from 9am to noon. Delivery company called at 11: 42 saying they were going to be late by about 45 min to a hour. Myself and 2 men (to assemble it) waited for them for 3 hours. It took the two men 3 hours to uncrate, figure out instructions, and put it together. So total time involved 6 hrs 45 min. Looks nice and works on first use. I will look for cleaning instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Frillie

customer_reviews.title: Dynamic is good The seller is dubious..do not trust them
customer_reviews.text: The unit is fine nice heat.. However .I would not do business with this seller and I will not recommend this seller to anyone. buyer beware. Use a different seller..
customer_reviews.author: JOHN RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Overall really enjoying the sauna however there is about a ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall really enjoying the sauna however there is about a quarter inch gap on the side and top of the glass door which kind of cancels out the advertised "This all translates to a quality sauna that retains heat more efficiently, heats up faster and wastes less energy. ".
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Too much great to say. Would buy one for everyone I love if I could afford it.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble on my own in under an hour. The instructions are terrible. It came with 4-5 different types of screws and it doesn’t tell you which ones to use at any step. I haven’t been able to get the Bluetooth to connect and the instructions have been useless there too. It warmed up as expected. Still have to figure out the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sauna and it has blue tooth!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with saying this is an amazing sauna! The setup was not too difficult as this is a very well made product. From unboxing to ready to use was probably close to 2 hours and I did it alone. With another person you could cut at least a half hour. I have never used infrared type sauna but I am very impressed. It is hot, makes me sweat, and feels great. The speakers work fantastic. One thing I didn’t know is the sauna has blue tooth!!! No need for the audio jack cord. If you are considering wether to buy or which one I would definitely say to get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent heat
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks in. I love using it. Main problem I have is not having a consistent temperature everywhere. Near the door is a drastic temperature difference and the leg / foot panels don’t heat nearly as well as the back and sides.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary H

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I absolutely love this sauna. It provides a perfect amount of space for only one person. Delivery was no problem I assisted the driver and we easily got it into the house with use of a two wheel dolly. My wife was able to assist me with the assembly which that extra person is very helpful. There were some hidden damages upon opening the package but they were in a location such that they were unseen was the assembly was completed so therefore I didn’t have a big problem with that. Overall for the price I think it’s well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: dmad

customer_reviews.title: DYNAMIC vs. JNH
customer_reviews.text: I bought and returned a JNH. DYNAMIC has far better engineering. The fit and finish is better. The layout of the heaters are better. This is the Low EMF model and they make an Ultra Low EMF model as well. You can probably find a lower EMF, but not on Amazon et this time. Do yourself a favor and don't let the lower price to value of the DYNAMIC brand lead you to make the JNH mistake. I can't compare customer service, because I didn't need to call DYNAMIC. But I had to with JNH, and it was the worst experience I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mincy

customer_reviews.title: Dry sauna - great product.
customer_reviews.text: This sauna is really well constructed - very very nice. The temperature seems to peat at about 124 degrees, and that is enough. I stay in it for about 20 mins, and have a nice warm glow, and am sweating at the end of it. It will not fit 2 people, unless you want to be sitting with sweaty bodies touching!!! Great for one person.
customer_reviews.author: NPMe

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Dynamic
customer_reviews.text: The glass door leaks air so bad that the front half of the cabin is useless. The foot and calf heaters are very low wattage and ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lingerfelt

customer_reviews.title: In Seventh Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a ONE person sauna unless you are teeny-weeny. That aside, both my husband and I LOVE it. Use it daily. Has helped with ailments for sure. Great value, shipped quickly. CON: We noticed a little air coming through the sides. Easily fixed with a sealer tape around the edges. No biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Great value for sauna at this price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sauna. Didn't love the condition of the box from the private delivery company that delivered it. Looked like it got thrown around a lot! Thankful the scratched up wood was in the back of the sauna and didn't affect the usability of sauna.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing Spa!
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes at all!!!! Easy to assemble....and it is Beautiful once together! I use it at 140 degrees for 25 min. and feel fantastic....we have a hot tub...I use that first for 20 min.....then head for the Spa....then a shower....Makes me feel like a new woman...I have arthritis and am 76 years old and these are without a doubt the best things He has ever bought me. You will be amazed at how beautiful it is....looks much more expensive!!! Don't Hesitate....its worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the sauna, my wife and I use it at least a couple of times a week. Not the worst to put together, great value. My only complaint is the leg area doesn't get as hot as I would like, but I break a great sweat and the light and bluetooth feature is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Sauna is amazing I use it everyday for at least 30 minutes to 90 min I sweat like crazy I love it ! I feel like a million bucks when I’m finished with my sauna session . The assembly will take 2 people for sure not hard but it takes two. It heats up to 153 max on my unit you can set it to 90 min or less and it has a Bluetooth the speakers sound great 👍🏾 it fits 1 comfortably you may be able to fit two but it will be tight . It does not come with a back rest which I wish it did . Overall amazing Sauna worth every penny 💯
customer_reviews.author: MzVee

customer_reviews.title: UPS amazing
customer_reviews.text: We have like all people lots of items delivered these days. The UPS person who came to our house was the nicest person we have met in a long time. He greeted us with a smile and left with one also. Was very careful about our item and we are very satisfied with our purchase. Great sauna too.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great so far! Received yesterday and was wondering in it last night! Tony, who was the company rep was a great help and comfort! The box was pretty damaged when arrived, but was packaged so we'll, no parts were damaged! It took two of us (my husband and I) who are not strong and older, about 2 1/2 hrs being overly cautious and slow to unpack and complete assembly!!! It took about 15 mins to get to 118 degrees and at the 20 ish mins to get to 135! Excellent! It is not however, big enough for us to sit in comfortably. We will definitely take turns!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it and your body will thank you.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Low EMF as well. Most of the panels read as 0 mG EMF, with the exception of one panel at 2.5 mG EMF. My cell phone puts off 15-25 mG while talking on it. The microwave puts of 250 mG if you stand close enough. I wouldn't worry about the EMF. It's easy to put together. Also, the Bluetooth speakers work and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: BCraw9

customer_reviews.title: AAAAAAAA+++
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble, quality construction. I LOVE this sauna. I tead other reviews that noted a cooler temp around the feet area. I solved this by wearing socks when I sauna. I don't know why more people don't have a sauna in their homes instead of a seldom used giant tub.
customer_reviews.author: the truth

customer_reviews.title: Love my sauna!
customer_reviews.text: I use my sauna every day! Love it! Heats up pretty quickly and gets to a sufficient temperature.

customer_reviews.title: Sound not great. Speakers buzz

But it feels great and warms up quickly. Awesome having a sauna whenever you feel like it. I just hope it's a healthy heat.

The Bluetooth is nice It would be wonderful to have the remote connected to Bluetooth to be able to forward songs and control volume Otherwise, this is a nice sauna and does a good job at hearing up fairly quickly The wood inside has nice smell

I would t recommend people in cold weather to have it installed as N backyard because you'd have to weather proof it to speed up heating and Lai taking the heat. I am in California and it takes 30 min to hear it up since it is located in backyard. One of these days I will "weatherize" it and hen report back on heating time. Overall very happy with it though. Will buy it again in future.

The sauna has some nice touches like being able to listen to an MP3 player and change the color and intensity of the overhead light.

Everything fit perfectly and I assembled it easily enough by myself in 20 minutes from unpacking. The amount of sweat that pours out of you is amazing and my skin feels so much cleaner and rejuvenated. Highly recommend to anyone.

I have read other reviews, and have noticed that a major comment is that the calf heater does not produce enough heat. I noticed that it is not as hot as the 4 that surround your upper body but still seems effective. Chromotherapy lighting is awesome also. It was Very easy to carry each piece into the house and installations are explanatory .

customer_reviews.title: It is dangerously high.This product ad statement about low EMF is not true. Dynamic Saunas AMZ-DYN-6106-01 Barcelona
customer_reviews.text: This product ad statement about low EMF is not true.It is dangerously high. I purchase a TriField Meter and check the the EMF, in some places it was as high 70 milligauss at more than 12 inches. It should read no more than 2-3 milligauss from 4 inches. Do not buy any product from Dynamic Saunas. If you do check the EMF for your own safety on any Saunas.

product_meta.title: DYNAMIC SAUNAS AMZ-DYN-6106-01 Barcelona 1-2 Person Far Infrared Sauna - Curbside Shipping
product_meta.description: Dynamic Low EMF Saunas are constructed with the environment in mind which accounts for our efforts in using Reforested Canadian Hemlock wood. Our sauna walls are double paneled constructed with the thickest interior and exterior wood planks compared to others in the same industry. This all translates to a quality sauna that retains heat more efficiently, heats up faster and wastes less energy. Dynamic 1-2 Person model offers 6 Low EMF infrared Carbon Energy Efficient heating panels (including an industry leading foot heater) that produce a wider, softer heat that is evenly distributed throughout the sauna. Our Low EMF infrared Carbon Energy Efficient heating panel heaters are 30% larger than saunas heated by ceramic tubes and penetrate skin 40% more to maximize therapeutic benefits. Unlike ceramic heaters, you will never have to replace our Carbon Energy Efficient heating panels. Unlike traditional rock and water saunas (which heat at or over 200F and do not penetrate your skin), Dynamic Saunas operate at a much lower and safer 130F. In fact, Dynamic Saunas operate most effectively at 120F thus allowing you to enjoy the sauna longer and maximize all potential health benefits. Dynamic 1-2 person sauna is designed for ease of use and is an outstanding value. Assembly is a snap and takes less than 1 hour. Enjoy the convenience of operating a Dynamic Sauna with our dual (int. and ext.) soft touch control panel and LED display featuring sauna temperature and time functions. Play your favorite music through the saunas built in MP3 aux connection with speakers. The sauna plugs into any dedicated 15 amp 110 volt outlet so no special wiring is required and the sauna may be installed on carpet and at any indoor location including the basement, garage, master bath or walk in closet. Our sauna would be a beautiful and worthwhile addition to any fitness room. See and feel the difference today!.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Dynamic Saunas Barcelona Infrared Sauna with 6 Heating Panels – 2 on the rear wall, 1 on each side wall, 1 under the bench & 1 on the floor

Sauna dimensions – 36” W x 32" D x 67" H | Interior dimensions - 39” W x 36" D x 73" H | Roof overhand – Add 2” | Weight – 250 lbs. | EMF level – between 5mG to 10mG | Wavelength – Between 6 & 12 microns
This item will be delivered curbside. To have the item delivered to a location of choice on your property, kindly make additional arrangements with a third party provider ahead of delivery
Natural Reforested Canadian Hemlock wood construction

FM/CD radio with MP3 auxiliary connection with 4 built-in speakers | 15” LCD Monitor with DVD Player | 6 Person Capacity | Interior reading/chromo therapy lighting system | Interior and Exterior LED Control Panel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
